code: import React from'react';import ServiceCard from'./ServiceCard';import{Col}from'reactstrap';import weatherImg from'../assets/images/weather.png';import guideImg from'../assets/images/guide.png';import customizationImg from'../assets/images/customization.png';import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var servicesData=[{imgUrl:weatherImg,title:'Calculate Weather',desc:'Accurate Weather Forecast Tools'},{imgUrl:guideImg,title:'Best Tour Guide',desc:'Discover With Expert Guides'},{imgUrl:customizationImg,title:'Custamization',desc:'Personalize Your Travel Experience'}];var ServiceList=function ServiceList(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:servicesData.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServiceCard,{item:item})},index);})});};export default ServiceList;
